TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DirectorySynchronization extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Specifies how to synchronize a directory within a domain.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the object.

Docs.param: A Byte data type object that specifies the directory synchronization search cookie.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization Copy() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a copy of the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetDirectorySynchronizationCookie() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the directory synchronization search cookie.
Docs.returns: The directory synchronization search cookie object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The returned search results must be enumerated before the cookie can be retrieved. For more information, see the code example [Taking a Snapshot for a Later DirSync Search](http://msdn.microsoft.com/msdnmag/issues/05/12/DirectoryServices/default.aspx?loc=&fig=true).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the options for the directory synchronization search.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The options that can be used with this property are found in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions> enumeration.

Docs.exception: The value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetDirectorySynchronizationCookie() cil managed

Docs.summary: Resetss the directory synchronization search cookie.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetDirectorySynchronizationCookie(unsigned int8[] cookie) cil managed

Docs.param: A Byte data type object that contains a directory synchronization search cookie. This method resets the cookie for this object instance to this value.
Docs.summary: Resets the directory synchronization search cookie.
